abstract: Jon Horvath, a former technology industry analyst, is the fourth former SAC employee to admit to illegal trading while employed at the fund. SAC has been a focus of federal authorities since the government began its crackdown on insider trading at hedge funds five years ago.

headline.main: Ex-SAC Analyst Pleads Guilty in Insider Trading Conspiracy
headline.print_headline: Former SAC Analyst Pleads Guilty to Insider Trading
